subject: Vam rumble motors
description_text:
Hi,
I have heard there has been some failures with the vam motors.

What warranty do they have?
What procedure follows if they fail?

Thank you,

Jarett

conversations.body_text: Hi Jarett Barnes,  The VAM assembly process has been improved. Under normal use, and as long as an incompatible mode is not selected, it should not be damaged. If any damage does occur, we will replace it.Â
